name: Merideth Wool Blend Down Parka - Women's

Merideth Parka Heathered Features: Centre front wind flap with convenient magnetic closures
Removable melton wool peaked inner hood, lined in anti-pill micro fleece
Heavy elastic rib cuffs w/ thumbhole openings
Neck lined in non-pill micro fleece

Technical features.Insulation :: Premium Canadian Origin White Duck Down
Technical features.Hood :: Yes, removable down hood with framing wire
Technical features.Pockets :: Interior zip stash pocket, upper front welt, fleece lined, hand warmer pockets, deep front panel pockets
Technical features.Waterproof :: Yes: 10 000 mm, DWR (Durable water repellant) coated
